ai-tha-ap161:0.3_0: The Elder Nāgas, having a lotus flower
ai-tha-ap161:1.3_0: Seeing the Teacher, supreme in the world,
ai-tha-ap161:2.3_0: made a Shrine for the woodland.
ai-tha-ap161:3.1_0: On the two occasions when the other goes forth
ai-tha-ap161:3.2_0: As a bird was worshipped by the flowers,
ai-tha-ap161:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap161:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Pukkusāti.
ai-tha-ap161:7.1_0: In the Nāga King Piṅgiya, having a ninth period,
